website_summaries.verdict: This humidifier adds essential oils to further improve the respiratory conditions inside your car.
pros: Essential oils soften effects of respiratory and nasal issues
Design is sturdy, prevents tipping, and holds 80 ml of liquid for hours of use
Features automatic shut off after 4 hours of use to extend longevity
cons: Some users have said the aromas could be stronger

customer_reviews.title: Great for long car drives and long work days!
customer_reviews.text: I accidentally bought two of these but I'm sure glad I did! One stays at my desk at work and the other in my car! I use this for my youngliving oils! This little diffuser is powerful in the car and you only need 3 drops of essential oil in there when you fill up! Don't diffuse lavender while driving... made that mistake and will make you drowsy.
customer_reviews.author: noremac

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this two months ago and it worked great at first. I loved it but unfortunately it just quit working out of the blue. I tried both the car adapter and the home adapter and it won’t work at all so I know it’s not the adapters - it’s got to be something in the internal mechanism. This was a pretty pricey item to only last for two months. I would suggest you keep looking.
customer_reviews.author: Locket

customer_reviews.title: I REALLY like this diffuser
customer_reviews.text: I REALLY like this diffuser. It only worked for 2 months with very little use. I cannot figure out where to send a complaint or even get this repaired. It was to expensive to work for only 2 months. I have emailed amazon and Zaq support and neither of them respond. I loved how it worked and really put the scent out. I guess I am unhappy for the customer service I am not receiving. I still have to give it 5 stars when working. :>}
customer_reviews.author: Awmetcalf

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: It was a great diffuser while it worked. I've had it 4 months and hadn't used it very much. I was careful to pour the water out in the direction suggested when I used it. Suddenly it stopped diffusing and it hasn't worked since.
customer_reviews.author: Cheri

customer_reviews.title: Great for home or car! Multifunctional
customer_reviews.text: Great for the car when traveling and great size for my bathroom when not using for travel! Has a car or home adapter so is multifunctional! This small diffuser packs almost just as much punch as all of my larger ones in the house! Great buy and love the ZAQ brand! This brand has always been dependable. Much better than the plug in pad diffusers for the car.
customer_reviews.author: J

customer_reviews.title: You can't control the traffic but you can most definitely make the journey more comfortable. Great gift for anyone who has a len
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to go along with a Shiatsu seat massager for my husband's daily long South Florida traffic commute and he LOVES it! You can't control the traffic but you can most definitely make the journey more comfortable. Great gift for anyone who has a lengthy commute or just enjoys aromatherapy oils.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. Foster

customer_reviews.title: small and works nice
customer_reviews.text: small enough to fit in a cup holder in a car. output is sufficient for its size.
customer_reviews.author: FireStorm

customer_reviews.title: up until today it has worked great very happy with the product however this afternoon it ...
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this diffuser for my truck back in August.... up until today it has worked great very happy with the product however this afternoon it stopped turning on has anybody experienced this and does anybody know how to contact the seller to find out if there is a repair Beyond this very happy with the product
customer_reviews.author: Jim

customer_reviews.title: This diffuser Rocks!
customer_reviews.text: I really like that this diffuser fits in my cup holder in my car. My car always smells good!! The diffuser also comes with a AC adapter to use in small areas in your home which makes it ever better!
customer_reviews.author: beachinjupiter

customer_reviews.title: Great diffuser for the car!
customer_reviews.text: This diffuser works great! I spend a lot of time driving, so I wanted something that would work in my car. This fits perfectly in my cup holder. It does a great job diffusing oils. I've even used it in my house in a moderately sized room and you can still smell the oil throughout the room and even down the hall.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer K

customer_reviews.title: Love this for car
customer_reviews.text: Love this for car!!! And it comes with a cord to plug in wall if you travel!!!! Don't buy a $10 one.
customer_reviews.author: Debby Bridge

customer_reviews.title: Nothing wrong with the product I just don't use it ...
customer_reviews.text: Nothing wrong with the product I just don't use it as much as I thought I would. It does tend to tip over & spill water out of it.
customer_reviews.author: K. Hodgin

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: It’s a wonderful product and I love getting into my car with my favorite oil scents.
customer_reviews.author: Deborah A Myers

customer_reviews.title: Reverses the effects of marinating in poop smell all day
customer_reviews.text: This little baby helps clear my car and my clothes of the poop smell that I marinate in all day working at a biodiesel plant. It also makes my commutes much more pleasant!
customer_reviews.author: Meaghen Hoops

customer_reviews.title: Did not work - do not buy.
customer_reviews.text: This diffuser did not work straight out of the box. It would not diffuse any mist at all. I tried it with the home and car adapter. I let it run for a couple of hours, but it didn't even produce small amount of mist. I would suggest you keep looking for a small compact diffuser.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love!
customer_reviews.text: I love this product, I wanted to test it out for a couple months and it still works great. Perfect for the car, no spilling or leaking. Only dislike is that I wish it came in more colors😊
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great diffuser for anywhere!
customer_reviews.text: Great for office and home, bought for girlfriend and have become spoiled to the great smell when it diffuses.
customer_reviews.author: Hurleyxb

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!!
customer_reviews.text: Very effective for the car beenn tuff to find one durable and for the car. Love this is
customer_reviews.author: naomi

customer_reviews.title: BUY THIS ONE!
customer_reviews.text: I first tried the car diffuser that requires using a wick. Too high maintenance. In order for it to work properly, the wick has to be changed frequently. I LOVE this one! A plus that the unit sits in the cup holder.
customer_reviews.author: MumlinsSC

customer_reviews.title: I really like it, it works great
customer_reviews.text: I use it every day on my way to and from school. I have an hour drive so I use an energizing essential oil blend to keep me awake and alert. I really like it, it works great!
customer_reviews.author: Stacy

customer_reviews.title: Love this diffuser!!
customer_reviews.text: Love this diffuser for my car. Fits in my drink holder perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: Quality diffuser
customer_reviews.text: This works so well in the car. I use it every day.
customer_reviews.author: Nina

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use and lasts hours before having to refill ...
customer_reviews.text: Wish I would have purchased this sooner! Easy to use and lasts hours before having to refill reservoir.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I use this every day as I drive to and ...
customer_reviews.text: I use this every day as I drive to and from work. It fills my car with the smell of my chosen oils but it isn't overwhelming at all. Very quiet and fits perfectly in the cup holder.
customer_reviews.author: Randi

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Goes through the water super fast and keeps running after I’ve turned my car off.
customer_reviews.author: SM

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This little thing works great love it and you can use anywhere
customer_reviews.author: Karen Rodriguez

customer_reviews.title: I LOVE it! Easy to use and compact
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this and it arrived just in time for me to bring it to my classroom. I LOVE it! Easy to use and compact... No extra filters to buy... Works great!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This is a great little difusser for the car and for traveling
customer_reviews.text: This is a great little difusser for the car and for traveling. So far I have had no issues with this difusser and it is very well-made.
customer_reviews.author: RnT

customer_reviews.title: You want this
customer_reviews.text: Love this. Small and fits in the cup holder in the car. Comes with car adapter plug in as well as wall plug. Would also be good to use in a small bathroom.
customer_reviews.author: Karsten Sluder

customer_reviews.title: Very Nice.
customer_reviews.text: Works great! Easy to use in or out of the car. Like the three settings too.
customer_reviews.author: Agility

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t work - waiting on customer service
customer_reviews.text: The lights are on but nobody’s home. It doesn’t work. At all.
customer_reviews.author: Sara Peters

customer_reviews.title: This is a great travel companion
customer_reviews.text: This is a great travel companion! Also love the fact that it can also be used in the home. Puts out a very nice amount of vapor as well. PS> Young Living is the best essential oil on the market.
customer_reviews.author: AwakenDiva

customer_reviews.title: Diffuses great in my car.
customer_reviews.text: I love this diffuser. My car smell wonderful and the vapor that comes out is incredible.
customer_reviews.author: J. A. Doty

customer_reviews.title: The other one so far works fine. This diffuser is better than the one I ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought 2, but one didn't work. It shuts off as soon as it diffuses. The other one so far works fine. This diffuser is better than the one I bought previously which cracked and hard to refill.
customer_reviews.author: AT

customer_reviews.title: Lasted 2 months and then stopped producing a mist. Completely.
customer_reviews.text: I searched high and low for this type of diffuser for my car. It worked decently for about 2 months and then it stopped producing a mist. I was hesitant to pay this price as it was on the higher end but I have the thought that you get what you pay for so as one of the most expensive car diffusers on amazon I went with it. It fit in the cup holder well but I did have spillage twice. The cap was a little difficult to get off.
customer_reviews.author: belovely

customer_reviews.title: It gives a pretty faint aroma
customer_reviews.text: Wish the output was a little stronger. It gives a pretty faint aroma, but over all I like it.
customer_reviews.author: Shawn

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely perfect for the car and travel. I am so glad I got it.
customer_reviews.author: Kathrine E. Hensley

customer_reviews.title: It works great!
customer_reviews.text: My wife uses this in her car and just loves it. It works great!
customer_reviews.author: Jeffreykm

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Works great! Fits in the cup holder in my car.
customer_reviews.author: B.J.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This is great product, I use this in my room
customer_reviews.author: madura gunawardana

customer_reviews.title: Best Car diffuser you can find.
customer_reviews.text: Best car diffuser you can find. I have 2 of these and my mother has one as well. Previously i opted to try something different due to price and all the pretty colors that was offered by other brands. needless to say, it was returned to amazon pretty quick and i went with this one. hands down, best one you can buy. Don't waste your time with anything else.
customer_reviews.author: Leslie H

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: Arrived quickly was just as posted. Works wonderfully in the car and even took it on vacation and used it in the hotel.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very good product.
customer_reviews.text: I've bought 3 of these so far. Very good product.
customer_reviews.author: Dawn Qualls

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love this! Works perfectly in the cup holder of my car.
customer_reviews.author: Heather S.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great Product. Works extremely well. Now my car smells like a spa
customer_reviews.author: Louis Laflamme

customer_reviews.title: Does NOT work
customer_reviews.text: Worst product ever!!!! Worked one time and never worked again. Do NOT waste your money
customer_reviews.author: tlawyer

customer_reviews.title: Worked for a few months... then quit
customer_reviews.text: Only worked for a few months. Now, it doesn't blow mist out of the top. I loved it while it worked. Used it in the car and on my desk at work. So disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: sue

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: This diffuser stopped working first time I used it. Not buying another!
customer_reviews.author: Heather

customer_reviews.title: 5 stars
customer_reviews.text: I love this! works great I use it in my car and in my home
customer_reviews.author: Judith N. Smoot

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Love this thing! Works beautifully! Fits in cup holder .
customer_reviews.author: Deborah Trail

customer_reviews.title: Get Another One- NO SMELL
customer_reviews.text: I could not smell this diffuser at all. It was smaller than I expected and I filled it 2-3 times with strong essences like Frankincense and got no noticeable difference in my car or home. Perhaps it is not strong enough to diffuse the heavier oils, like citrus, etc. The water tank is also way too small. I got a Radha diffuser instead (read third party reviews to find) which has great reviews on Amazon and THOUSANDS of them; it also has a full 17 oz water chamber and can run 10-17 hours at a time. Best part? Now I can SMELL the oils that I put in it!
customer_reviews.author: Jason R. Rane

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Diffuser!!!! Car and Home
customer_reviews.text: Amazing diffuser! I love this. It comes with a car charger and AC plug for home. It lasts about 3.5 hours, uses about an ounce+ of water. Handles essential oils effortlessly. I noticed it went up $10 since I bought it over a month ago. It is still worth every penny as I recommend this to many folks. I have 3 diffusers running at any given time so it is well used and holding up great.
customer_reviews.author: Mari B

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful!
customer_reviews.text: I'm in love with this little diffuser! I just got back from a LONG road trip, and it was made so much more bearable by my diffuser, which fits perfectly in my cup holder. I love the different settings, and the output is better than some of the larger diffusers I have. Great product!
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Travel Ready
customer_reviews.text: This makes driving long distances in my car a delight. I hate being stuck in traffic and smelling the exhaust. I just throw some lemon or mint essential oil inside and it fills the dry air with a fragrant all natural mist. No chemicals. Just water and essential oils. I also use this as my travel aromatherapy volcano since it's small, sturdy, fits well in a suitcase and takes away the "hotel" smell of rooms when I'm flying out of the state/country.
customer_reviews.author: Marie SherilTop Contributor: Sailor Moon

customer_reviews.title: PERFECT for Car Use!
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE this diffuser for my car. I only wish it came with a USB cable option as well. It fits right in the cup holder. It doesn't hold a TON of water, but I like that because it's not like I'm typically in my car for long hours at a time anyway. I like that I can use normal tap water too. It diffuses just enough mist, so it's not over powering or too underwhelming. It's been working wonderfully so far!
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl J

customer_reviews.title: Amazing little diffuser!
customer_reviews.text: I could not be more happy with this little diffuser! I actually purchased a different one, but was very dissatisfied with it cutting off and on so I decided to spend a little more money and get this one. So happy! It puts out an enormous amount of steam as you can see from the photo and so far not cutting off for no reason. If you are on the fence about spending a little more money, don't be! This one is worth it!
customer_reviews.author: David B

customer_reviews.title: Great Traveling Companion
customer_reviews.text: We use this diffuser on all our long car rides, in which I use some essential oil drops to prevent motion sickness for my kiddos. It works great and makes the car smell nice. I bring both power cords with me on trips - the one for the car's cigarette lighter outlet and the one for the normal power outlet in a house. When not driving, we use this diffuser in the bedroom for more peaceful sleeping. I love that this one diffuser can be used in both ways, and is so compact and easy to use for travel.
customer_reviews.author: heather

customer_reviews.title: It's also a nice size to travel with
customer_reviews.text: I have two of these little diffusers! I use one in my car and I use the second in my office. It doesn't take up much space on my desk and it works so well! It's also a nice size to travel with, although it doesn't last all night unless you refill it during the night. I have had the first one for several months and I have had no trouble with it!
customer_reviews.author: TurtlesRMe

customer_reviews.title: The water heats up and makes the oils smell
customer_reviews.text: My oils started to smell rank out of this diffuser. I only use Doterra so I didn’t know what was wrong until I touched the water right after I used it and the water was very warm. So you can only use this diffuser for one day. If there’s any oil/water left in it it’ll smell rank the next day. So I try not to fill it all the way up in order to not waste my oils.
customer_reviews.author: Selina Lin

customer_reviews.title: So far so good. I spilled it a couple of times and ...
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. I spilled it a couple of times and was able to dry it out. (you can take it apart and dry it much faster than three days) I am pleased with it.
customer_reviews.author: James Herrera

customer_reviews.title: Keeps me calm while driving.
customer_reviews.text: I plug it in when I have to drive long distances (I add stress-relieving aromatherapy oil) and it keeps me calm, focused and relaxed, regardless if I get lost on the way - I don't freak out. What a great little gadget! I have a big ZAQ one for home as well. This one is a great addition! Very happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: B.V.

customer_reviews.title: Can be plugged into the car.
customer_reviews.text: I have wanted something to put moisture into the air in our vehicles. I have chronic dry eyes. When you put the heater or air conditioner on the air becomes dry. So this will work two fold. I’ll have moisture and can use my essential oils. Awesome!
customer_reviews.author: Red

customer_reviews.title: Sadly Doesn’t Last More Than A Month
customer_reviews.text: First one didn’t work at all. The replacement worked just until the return window with Amazon passed. Power cord may be the problem. It will come on and then go right back off.
customer_reviews.author: jpkc97

customer_reviews.title: Great, versatile diffuser!
customer_reviews.text: Great product! I take this whenever I travel, I can diffuse in my vehicle then plug it in at my destination. ..this is the second diffuser I bought from this company and both have operated flawlessly!
customer_reviews.author: Barbara Robertson

customer_reviews.title: This is great to use in the car and great at work ...
customer_reviews.text: We are such fans of our oil diffusers at home and wanted to take our oils with us. This is great to use in the car and great at work and the price is unbeatable!
customer_reviews.author: x10eho

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size and works great!
customer_reviews.text: This is perfect size for my husband’s big truck. The intermittent mister is awesome and works great for a small confined area too. We love it!
customer_reviews.author: Barbara W

customer_reviews.title: Best car diffuser
customer_reviews.text: Hands down, the best car diffuser I've ever purchased. Runs great, definitely recommend. I have purchased these as gifts. Love them.
customer_reviews.author: Mary J. Demers

customer_reviews.title: Works in car and in home
customer_reviews.text: Its great for the car and using in the house. It comes with car adapter and electric plug for the house. Im very happy.
customer_reviews.author: deeej

customer_reviews.title: Happy
customer_reviews.text: It's one of the best investment I made in a while. I would definitely buy another one in the near future.
customer_reviews.author: Karen Hebert

customer_reviews.title: Great little diffuser
customer_reviews.text: Works very well. Great output and helpful for my sinuses in the heated car.
customer_reviews.author: my2cents

customer_reviews.title: I'm in love with this little diffuser!
customer_reviews.text: This is the perfect little diffuser for travel! It fits perfectly in a car cup holder and is just the right size for a hotel room. I also love that it has adjustable output and has an intermittent diffusing option.
customer_reviews.author: Mickie Gibbs

customer_reviews.title: Fits well in a cup holder.
customer_reviews.text: I love that it fits in a cup holder. However when the air conditioner is on it just blows the mist away and you can't really smell it.
customer_reviews.author: mabbe

customer_reviews.title: Love!!
customer_reviews.text: I love, love, love this diffuser!! It fits in my car's cup holder and puts out a nice amount of vapor. Also, love that you can enjoy it in the house or car! I have bought 2 more as gifts...great diffuser!!
customer_reviews.author: JP

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I love this diffuser. It's compact, easy to use and I especially like the intermittent feature. Great product.
customer_reviews.author: spiritdancer

customer_reviews.title: So quiet I'd even call it silent. Lid twists ...
customer_reviews.text: So quiet I'd even call it silent. Lid twists on and locks which makes this an ideal water-based diffuser for the car.
customer_reviews.author: JZ

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: I loved this product, I have been experimenting with oes for a while & love diffusers. Being able to have this in my car for my hour drive to and from work everyday is wonderful.
customer_reviews.author: Kirstin Weiss

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely the best little cool air mister for my vehicle. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five stars!
customer_reviews.text: The only way it could possibly be better would be if it were a different color...all black. Otherwise, works great. Exactly what I was hoping for.
customer_reviews.author: Alexis Simmons

customer_reviews.title: Happy with purchase
customer_reviews.text: Love the portability of this unit. Brought it on all our adventures this summer!
customer_reviews.author: Katia M Wierenga

customer_reviews.title: Last for over 3 hours
customer_reviews.text: Wife loved it and worked better than she thought it would.
customer_reviews.author: Lucky1

customer_reviews.title: This diffuser takes care of a gym bag and a Jeep
customer_reviews.text: This is the BEST! I love this little diffuser, it puts out great aroma and has easy to use settings while I drive. It only takes a few drops (don't use too much, it REALLY smells up the car!) It fits in my cup holder with no problem and the top comes on and off very easy to refill. My gym bag tends to stink up my Jeep, this takes care of the problem 100% I can't think of any way to improve this product. If you are looking to get your car smelling great, this diffuser is the ticket. Great price and great product.
customer_reviews.author: Taylor Ross

customer_reviews.title: Awesome! I use it in our minivan and it ...
customer_reviews.text: Awesome! I use it in our minivan and it reaches the kids in the second row instantaneously and puts out a good mist and smell amount. Also love the option to run the mist continuously or for 30 seconds intermittently. Looks great and fits well in the cup holder. Also LOVE that it just requires water and essential oil without the use of a wick (so no replacement cost 👍🏼). Finally I like that this one came with both a standard home plug and a cigarette lighter attachment for the car. Would recommend and definitely purchase again!
customer_reviews.author: TXMomof2

customer_reviews.title: I really love this diffuser
customer_reviews.text: I really love this diffuser. It is perfect for the smaller space inside of a car. I used a subtle blend of oils and it isn't overwhelming at all. It also comes with a wall plug, but I found that when I brought it inside my office at work, it ran out of water a lot quicker than in the car. I plan to only use it in the car. No complaints!!
customer_reviews.author: Heather R. Erkel

customer_reviews.title: Perfect car diffuser- a little goes a long way!
customer_reviews.text: I love this car diffuser. It is nicely compact to fit in a cup holder in the car. You use filtered water in it, and it is recommended to add 3-4 drops of essential oil in it. The scent from the diffuser is light with the mist, and it fills the entire car without being too much. My only wish is that the charging station for this device included a USB port so I can also charge and use my GPS while using this diffuser. All in all, this was a great purchase and I love it. Perfect for my car and for my lifestyle!
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Carina

customer_reviews.title: Super sad. Loved the product
customer_reviews.text: Super sad. Loved the product. Was awesome for four days. Still awesome if plugged in to outlet but the cord that plugs into the car was cheap and broke after four days. Little parts rattling around in it. I've tried to replace it but nothing fits :( UPDATE: bought a second one. Plugged it in. Nothing. Not a thing. Will be shopping for other manufacturers.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly

customer_reviews.title: I love it!
customer_reviews.text: I love it!!!! This is my third travel diffuser, and I'm sticking with this brand/style! Creates so much vapor, I used probably 10 drops of oil, and it worked great! The other two I had worked alright, one was the "hot plate" method the other used a straw/sponge... This is the style I'll be sticking with from now on. I love the color, it fits great in my cup holder, BPA free, super easy to refill while moving (as the passenger, not while driving). Awesome product!
customer_reviews.author: LyLou

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY
customer_reviews.text: Stopped working within two days of use. Do not buy this product. You're wasting your time.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel

product_meta.title: ZAQ Breeze Essential Oil Litemist Aromatherapy Compact Size Diffuser - 70ML - USB Powered - USB Cable Included - Travel Size, Olive
product_meta.description: Color:OliveBreeze is a travel friendly aromatherapy diffuser that fits in your vehicle's cup holder. The ultrasonic technology transforms the interior of your car, or even your kitchen, living room or reading area, into a tranquil space. Its unique design prevents tipping while your vehicle is in motion and the car adapter, included in the box, ensures you can always use it on the go.
feature_bullets: Compact round shape that fits almost anywhere
Innovative design that improves scent dispersion and humidity Portability that lets you take your favorite scents with you
Small-Size Diffuser 3.55" x 3.55" - Perfect for 80ML Micro USB Travel Purposes
ZAQ Breeze is BPA Free and made of safe, Health Friendly Materials
Power consumption: USB Powered, USB Adapter not Included, Cable Included Voltage: 12V DC Operating time: 4 hours Automatic Shut Off
ZAQ Full 1 Year Warranty, with Unlimited Support

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Currently, item can be shipped only within the U.S. and to APO/FPO addresses. For APO/FPO shipments, please check with the manufacturer regarding warranty and support issues.
specifications.International Shipping: This item can be shipped to select countries outside of the U.S.
